p: Northern blotting analysis was carried out by using DIG Northern Starter Kit (Roche) following the manufacturer’s protocol. The integral RNA was hybridized with a digoxigenin (DIG)-labeled RNA probe of the fab1 gene overnight at 42°C. The double-stranded DNA probes specific for fab1 was synthesized via PCR using primers 5’-TGAACCTTCCTCGTCCTC-3’ and 5’-CCACATTCGCTAGTCACAG-3’. The actin gene was used as control and the probe was generated via PCR using primers 5’-TGATGAGGCACAGTCCAAGCG-3’ and 5’-CACCGATCCAGACGGAGTATTT-3’. Chemiluminescent signals were detected using a fluorescence scanner (ImageQuant TL, GE Healthcare).
